content: according to color pattern pg 4 through row 104 104 104 102 104 armhole shaping next row rs bobble 6 sts work to end in 1x1 rib pattern ws row work even in 1x1 rib pattern next rs row bobble 2 sts work to end in 1x1 rib pattern 35 37 43 47 53 sts remain decrease 1 st at beginning of next 2 rs row as follows k1 ssk work in 1x1 rib pattern to end after all decreases complete 33 35 41 45 51 sts remain work even through row 135 135 135 141 141 neck shaping decrease for neck edge every row 10 11 13 13 16 times starting on row 136 136 136 142 142 as follows ws p1 p2tog work in 1x1 rib pattern to end rs work in 1x1 rib pattern to last 3 sts k2tog k1 23 24 28 32 35 sts remain after working all decrease row last decrease row is row 145 146 148 154 157 work 1 0 0 0 1 row even bobble all sts in 1x1 rib right front work as for left front through row 105 105 105 103 105 next row ws bobble 6 sts work to end in 1x1 rib pattern next row rs work even in 1x1 rib pattern next row bobble 2 sts work to end in 1x1 rib pattern 35 37 43 47 53 sts remain decrease 1 st at end of next 2 rs row working ws row even in 1x1 rib pattern as follows work in 1x1 rib pattern to last 3 sts k2tog k1 after all decreases complete 33 35 41 45 51 sts remain work even through row 135 135 135 141 141 neck shaping decrease for neck edge every row 10 11 13 13 16 times starting on row 136 136 136 142 142 as fol- lows ws work even in 1x1 rib pattern to last 3 sts p2tog p1 rs k1 ssk work to end in 1x1 rib pattern 23 24 28 32 35 sts remain after working all decrease row www andreaknits com the dude 7 copyright © andrea rangel 2013 last decrease row is row 145 146 148 154 157 work 1 0 0 0 1 row even bobble all sts in 1x1 rib sleeves *note on sleeves in the photos the sleeves are rolled up but they still follow the same color pattern as the front and back pieces if you prefer shorter sleeves work fewer row of mc before switching to cc1 in the color pat- tern read all of the instructions before beginning including those on the sleeve charts shaping must be worked at the same time as working the color pattern co 37 41 47 55 57 in mc with us #6/4 00 mm 24 in-32 in/60-80 cm circular needle row 1 k1 *k1 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k2 row 2 p1 *p1 k1 repeat from * to last 2 sts p2 repeat row 1 and
